summary:
Analysis of structurally complex areas using limited geologic and seismic data. Development of innovative geologic syntheses constrained by modelling from plate to thin-section scale. Construction of regional to local scale plate kinematic models, structural maps and cross-sections in all kinds of geological settings. Tectonic, thermal, subsidence and stratigraphic modelling of sedimentary basins. 21 years expertise in Bolivia, Chile, Peru, Colombia, Venezuela, Trinidad, Suriname, Panama, Mexico, Gulf of Mexico. 12 years consultancy working in multidisciplinary industry-related setting on non-exclusive multi-client and single client projects, from regional syntheses to fast-track bid round evaluation.

Specialties: Structural geology, plate tectonics, stratigraphy, field geology, basin analysis, hydrocarbon systems analysis.
